Dialogue: Heyo! Good to see you again man!
This is Lily. The girl I was telling you about!
I told her my feelings after you gave me those flowers.
It turns out the feeling was mutual between us!
It's funny that the world ending gave me courage, kinda ironic right?
Thanks again for your help with the roses, they're her favorite!
I'm real lucky man. She has such a way with words.
